attributes.action: Online Paedophile Hunting is way out of control and needs to be regulated.
attributes.additional_details:
There are many many groups on facebook where there is all the evidence needed to see just how out of control and dangerous this industry is.
It needs regulating and people vetting properly.
Real children are being offered to paedophiles as bait to sting them live on Facebook.
Allegedly a 13-year-old child was raped because hunters baited her to paedophiles online with the intention to sting them for Facebook fame.

Move the scum on and do things properly!
attributes.background:
Sick of seeing vile low life drug-ravaged scumbags so-called protecting children from online predators when really they are doing it for fame.
Suspects are committing suicide because of animalistic behaviour b these so-called hunters who lack both emotional intelligence and morals.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Much of the behaviour described in your petition is already illegal in the UK.

If you believe a crime has been committed, you should report it to the police. You can find out more about how to do that here:

https://www.police.uk/information-and-advice/reporting-crime/

You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a specific change in the law. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/213997
